targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  create_time AS "time",
  progress
FROM ca_analysis
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(create_time)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Charts are organized by the Research & Development stages below

options.content: Development

panels.description:
1. Total number of Pull/Merge request created.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  count(*) as value
FROM 
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
WHERE
  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Pull Request Count

panels.description:
1. Total number of Pull/Merge request merged.
2. The PR/MR being calculated are filtered by "PR/MR creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  count(*) as value
FROM
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
WHERE
  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
  and state = 'merged'
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)

panels.title: Pull Request Pass Count

panels.description: Pull Request Pass Count/Pull Request Count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  1.0 * count(case when state = 'merged' then 1 else null end)/count(*)
FROM
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
WHERE
  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)

panels.title: Pull Request Pass Rate (%)

panels.description:
1. Pull Request Pass Rate over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", value "pull_request_pass_rate" of "2021-06-01" calculates the PR/MR whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with _mr_request_rate as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY) as time,
    state
  FROM
    gitlab_merge_requests gmr
    LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
  WHERE
    jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
    and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
)

SELECT 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  1.0 * count(case when state = 'merged' then 1 else null end)/count(*) as "Pull Request Pass Rate"
FROM _mr_request_rate
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Pull Request Pass Rate over Time

panels.description: The average round of PR/MR review.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  avg(review_rounds) as value
FROM 
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
WHERE
  state = 'merged'
  and review_rounds > 0
  and jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Average Pull Request Review Round

panels.description:
1. Avg PR/MR Review Round over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", value "Avg Pull Request Review Round" of "2021-06-01" calculates the PR/MR whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp(DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY)) as time,
  avg(review_rounds) as "Pull Request Reveiw Round"
FROM
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
WHERE
  state = 'merged'
  and review_rounds > 0
  and jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Average Pull Request Review Round over Time

panels.description: The average round of PR/MR review of PR authors.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  author_username as Author,
  avg(review_rounds) as value
FROM 
  gitlab_merge_requests gmr
  LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
WHERE
  state = 'merged'
  and review_rounds > 0
  and jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 3 desc
limit 20

panels.title: Average Pull Request Review Round by Author

panels.description: One-time pass rate for PR over time.

targets.rawSql:
with _review_rounds as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(gitlab_created_at), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gitlab_created_at))+1 DAY) as time,
    review_rounds
  FROM
    gitlab_merge_requests gmr
    LEFT JOIN jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp ON jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gmr.project_id
  WHERE
    state = 'merged'
    and review_rounds > 0
    and jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
    and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
)

SELECT 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  count(case when review_rounds = 1 then true else null end)/count(*) as one_time_pass_rate
FROM 
  _review_rounds
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: One-time Pass Rate for Code Reviews over Time

options.content: Test

panels.description:
1. Total number of bugs created.
2. The bugs being calculated are filtered by "bug creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  count(*) as value
FROM
  jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.issue_id = jbi.issue_id
WHERE
 std_type = 'Bug'
  and jbi.board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(created)

panels.title: Number of Bugs found in Testing

panels.description:
1. Number of bugs created over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", bug_count of "2021-06-01" calculates the bugs whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with _bugs as (
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(ji.created), INTERVAL -$interval(date(ji.created))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(distinct ji.issue_id) as bug_count
  FROM
    jira_issues ji
    LEFT JOIN jira_board_issues jbi ON jbi.issue_id = ji.issue_id
  WHERE
    std_type = 'Bug'
    and jbi.board_id = $board_id
    and $__timeFilter(ji.created)
  group by 1
  order by 1
) 

select 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  bug_count
from _bugs

panels.title: Number of Bugs found in Testing over Time

panels.description:
1. Total number of bugs found per 1,000 lines of code, including both added and deleted llines of code.
2. The bugs being calculated are filtered by "bug creation time". The lines of code being calculated are filtered by "commit creation time" (both are affected by the time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
with bc as (
	select 
	  count(*) as bug_count
	from 
	  jira_issues ji 
	  left join jira_board_issues jbi on (jbi.issue_id = ji.issue_id)
	where 
	  jbi.board_id = $board_id
	  and ji.std_type = 'Bug'
	  and $__timeFilter(ji.created)
),

loc as (
	select 
	  sum(additions + deletions) as line_count
	from 
	  gitlab_commits gc 
	  left join jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp on jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gc.project_id
	where
	  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
	  and gc.title not like 'Merge branch %'
	  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
)

select 
  now() as time, 
  1.0 * bc.bug_count / loc.line_count * 1000 as value
from loc,bc

panels.title: Bug Count per 1k lines of code (Total)

panels.description:
1. Bug Count per 1k lines of code over time.
2. When Time Interval is set to "month", bug_count_per_1k_LOC of "2021-06-01" calculates the bugs whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01) and lines of code whose commit creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with bc as (
	select
	  DATE_ADD(date(ji.created), INTERVAL -$interval(date(ji.created))+1 DAY) as time,
	  count(*) as bug_count
	from 
	  jira_issues ji 
	  left join jira_board_issues jbi on jbi.issue_id = ji.issue_id
	where 
	  jbi.board_id = $board_id
	  and ji.type = 'Bug'
	  and $__timeFilter(ji.created)
	group by 1
),
loc as (
	select 
	  DATE_ADD(date(gc.authored_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gc.authored_date))+1 DAY) as time,
	  sum(additions + deletions) as line_count
	from 
	  gitlab_commits gc 
	  left join jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp on jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gc.project_id
	where 
	  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
	  and gc.title not like 'Merge branch %'
	  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
	group by 1
),
bug_count_per_1k_loc as(
  select 
    bc.time,
    1.0 * bc.bug_count / loc.line_count * 1000 as bug_count_per_1k_loc
  from 
    loc
    left join bc on bc.time = loc.time
  where
    bc.bug_count is not null 
    and loc.line_count is not null
)

select 
  timestamp(time) as time, 
  bug_count_per_1k_loc 
from bug_count_per_1k_loc
order by 1;

panels.title: Bug Count per 1k lines of code (Breakdown by Time)

options.content: Operation

panels.description:
1. Total number of incidents created.
2. The incidents being calculated are filtered by "incident creation time" (time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  count(*) as value
FROM
  jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.issue_id = jbi.issue_id
WHERE
  std_type = 'Incident'
  and jbi.board_id = $board_id
  and $__timeFilter(created)

panels.title: Number of Incidents found after shipping

panels.description:
1. Number of incidents created over time.
2. The time granularity can be switched to week or month by "Time Interval" above. 
3. When Time Interval is set to "month", incident_count of "2021-06-01" calculates the incidents whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with _incidents as (
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(ji.created), INTERVAL -$interval(date(ji.created))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(distinct ji.issue_id) as incident_count
  FROM
    jira_issues ji
    LEFT JOIN jira_board_issues jbi ON jbi.issue_id = ji.issue_id
  WHERE
    std_type = 'Incident'
    and jbi.board_id = $board_id
    and $__timeFilter(ji.created)
  group by 1
  order by 1
) 

select 
  timestamp(time) as time,
  incident_count
from _incidents

panels.title: Number of Incidents found after shipping over Time

panels.description:
1. Total number of incidents found per 1,000 lines of code, including both added and deleted llines of code.
2. The incidents being calculated are filtered by "incident creation time". The lines of code being calculated are filtered by "commit creation time" (both are affected by the time filter at the upper-right corner)

targets.rawSql:
with ic as (
	select 
	  count(*) as incident_count
	from 
	  jira_issues ji 
	  left join jira_board_issues jbi on (jbi.issue_id = ji.issue_id)
	where 
	  jbi.board_id = $board_id
	  and ji.type = 'Incident'
	  and $__timeFilter(ji.created)
),

loc as (
	select 
	  sum(additions + deletions) as line_count
	from 
	  gitlab_commits gc 
	  left join jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp on jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gc.project_id
	where
	  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
	  and gc.title not like 'Merge branch %'
	  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
)

select 
  now() as time, 
  1.0 * ic.incident_count / loc.line_count * 1000 as value
from loc,ic

panels.title: Incident Count per 1k lines of code (Total)

panels.description:
1. Incident Count per 1k lines of code over time.
2. When Time Interval is set to "month", incident_count_per_1k_LOC of "2021-06-01" calculates the incidents whose creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01) and lines of code whose commit creation time falls under [2020-06-01, 2020-07-01)

targets.rawSql:
with ic as (
	select 
	  DATE_ADD(date(ji.created), INTERVAL -$interval(date(ji.created))+1 DAY) as time,
	  count(*) as incident_count
	from 
	  jira_issues ji 
	  left join jira_board_issues jbi on jbi.issue_id = ji.issue_id
	where 
	  jbi.board_id = $board_id
	  and ji.type = 'Incident'
	  and $__timeFilter(ji.created)
	group by 1
),
loc as (
	select 
	  DATE_ADD(date(gc.authored_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(gc.authored_date))+1 DAY) as time,
	  sum(additions + deletions) as line_count
	from 
	  gitlab_commits gc 
	  left join jira_board_gitlab_projects jbgp on jbgp.gitlab_project_id = gc.project_id
	where 
	  jbgp.jira_board_id = $board_id
	  and gc.title not like 'Merge branch %'
	  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
	group by 1
),
incident_count_per_1k_loc as(
  select 
    ic.time,
    1.0 * ic.incident_count / loc.line_count * 1000 as incident_count_per_1k_loc
  from 
    loc
    left join ic on ic.time = loc.time
  where
    ic.incident_count is not null 
    and loc.line_count is not null
)

select 
  timestamp(time) as time, 
  incident_count_per_1k_loc 
from incident_count_per_1k_loc
order by 1;

panels.title: Incident Count per 1k lines of code (Breakdown by Time)

list.definition: select distinct concat(name, ': ', board_id) from jira_boards
list.label: Choose Board
list.name: board_id
list.query: select distinct concat(name, ': ', board_id) from jira_boards

title: Delivery Quality (require Jira and Gitlab data)
